title: Year 39: Re-Coordinator
description: Each number in the INBOX is an address of a tile on a 4 x 4 floor. Send to the OUTBOX the coordinates of that tile, column first, row second.
For example, an address of 1 has coordinates 1, 0; an address of 6 has coordinates 2, 1; an address of 11 has coordinates 3, 2.
